title: Challenges around childbearing owe to dissatisfaction among surgical residents

title_detail.value: Challenges around childbearing owe to dissatisfaction among surgical residents

summary: Research suggests female medical students are deterred by the perception that surgeons have difficulty balancing professional and personal pursuits. Nevertheless, in recent years, female surgeons have become more likely to begin families during residency rather than waiting until their completion of training as they might have in the past.
